overview:
## Discussion

This method is the setter method for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibilityProtocol] protocol’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-c.protocol/accessibilityFrame] property. By implementing this method, you allow accessibility clients to modify this element’s frame.

# setAccessibilityFrame(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the accessibility element’s frame.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func setAccessibilityFrame(_ frame: NSRect)
```

## Parameters

- **frame**: The new frame in screen coordinates.

## Discussion

This method is the setter method for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibilityProtocol] protocol’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-c.protocol/accessibilityFrame] property. By implementing this method, you allow accessibility clients to modify this element’s frame.
title: setAccessibilityFrame(_:)
